reviewText: A fantastic collection of brilliant mystery movies.
OK

Boris Karloff is an oriental sleuth. His normal menacing demeanor is absent in these clever mysteries to be replaced by the normal humility of an oriental person.  The stories are convoluted, but Mr. Wong figures out all the twists and turns by the end of the film. Families can watch these films without worring about adult situations, graphic violence, or bad language.
I purchased this item for a Christmas gift for a relative who is fond of these great old Charlie Chan movies.
The review of this volume is the same as for the rest of the series. Some movies are good, others not so good. The quality on some are good, some not so good.

The mystery movies on this DVD was great viewing.  I will admit that I love all kinds of mystery movies but the Mr Wong Movies, and there are a number of them, are interesting and easy viewing, no blood and gore.  If you like the older mystery movies you will find this DVD fantastic.
I , personally, enjoy the older movies at times and these are good. yes i do enjoy modern movies , but older movies do have their charm
look at movie & enjoyed.i have always love old classic movies for years.i really don't have to much to say about this movie expect order and enjoyed.

The description leads you to believe that there are two Detective Wong movies, when in fact the one starring Bela Lugosi is another Mr. Wong who is a criminal.  Sound quality is poor on all videos,even considering the available technology when these movies were filmed.  Save your money and buy a burger.

I remember Mr Wong from when we first got TV at home.  This was a real treat to be able to see these again.
My husband and I enjoy watching the 4 movies very much.
I love cheesy old movies
Enjoyed them greatly.  I really like the old mystery films.

I'm disappointed all of mystery classic DVDs have no closed caption or subtitled for the Deaf and Hard of Hearing...I alway wanted to watch them with cc or sdh...I don't buy any of them unless they have cc or sdh.
Very good movies
Great "Late, Late Show" type movies.  Not blockbusters, but good, solid entertainment from a more innocent era.
fun for fans of the old black and white mysteries
good
good
I am very satisfied with this purchase.
Having never viewed any of these movies before they did not disappoint, but remember that they see "oldies" and they are what they are and they are just light entertainment
